title: Just Cause
notes: Game stops recognising keyboard after splash screens

title: Just Cause
notes: Couldn't get past the title screen upon first starting the game. After rebooting, I got into gameplay (about 25fps) but it didn't register keyboard inputs during gameplay, rendering it unplayable.

title: Just Cause
notes: Sometimes the controls doesn't respond. To solve this you need to restart the game.

title: Just Cause
notes: Game starts up fine but then there is no keyboard or mouse input to get beyond the start-up screen.
At some moment keyboard stops working. To avoid that you must keep pushing the buttons at least every couple of seconds.
title: Just Cause

notes: Hangs on intro screen, keyboard not detected. As this runs fine with WINE in 32bit prefix a Proton option for a 32bit prefix would most likely fix it.
title: Just Cause

notes: Keyboard input often stops working and repeatedly hitting keys is necessary to get into game.
title: Just Cause

cpu: AMD A8-9600 RADEON R7, 10 COMPUTE CORES 4C+6G
notes: Appears to work perfectly however, other reports indicate controls locking up after during a long play session so, take this report with a grain of salt
title: Just Cause

notes: Keyboard not working - cannot get past "Press Enter"
title: Just Cause
